main event: On March 11, 1955, two women observed a bright, metallic object that sounded like a jet in Redwood Valley, California.
interesting points: The object was the size of a jet and emitted a sound similar to that of a jet., It had a silver appearance and was observed to be longer in a southerly direction., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes., Smoke was reported coming from the object., This incident was documented and investigated by the Air Force.
